prokimenon: O Shepherd of Israel, hear us,
Shine forth from Your Cherubic throne.
second_prokimenon: Raise a song and sound the timbrel.
aposticha: I have enslaved my soul’s dignity to the passions;* and have become like the cattle,* and have no strength to lift my eyes to You in the highest.* But like the Publican, O Christ, with my head bowed down,* I pray to You, and cry aloud:* O God cleanse me and save me.
